title: Women of childbearing age have staggeringly low rates of lipid screening

title_detail.value: Women of childbearing age have staggeringly low rates of lipid screening

summary: Eight out of 10 women of childbearing age have never had their cholesterol levels checked, despite clear guidelines to get a first lipid blood test early in adulthood, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Eight out of 10 women of childbearing age have never had their cholesterol levels checked, despite clear guidelines to get a first lipid blood test early in adulthood, according to new research.
